00023 int SCTPSocket::bind( const std::vector<std::string>& localAddresses, unsigned short localPort /* = 0 */)
00024 {
00025     size_t size = localAddresses.size();
00026     std::vector<sockaddr_in> dest(size);
00027 
00028     for( size_t i = 0; i < size; ++i)
00029         fillAddress( localAddresses[i], localPort, dest[i]);
00030 
00031     int ret = sctp_bindx( m_socket, reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>(dest.data()), size, SCTP_BINDX_ADD_ADDR);
00032     if(ret < 0)
00033         throw SocketException("Set of local address and port failed (sctp_bindx)");
00034     return ret;
00035 }

00037 int SCTPSocket::connect( const std::vector<std::string>& foreignAddresses, unsigned short foreignPort /* = 0 */)
00038 {
00039     size_t size = foreignAddresses.size();
00040     std::vector<sockaddr_in> dest(size);
00041 
00042     for( size_t i = 0; i < size; ++i)
00043         fillAddress( foreignAddresses[i], foreignPort, dest[i]);
00044 
00045     int ret = sctp_connectx( m_socket, reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>(dest.data()), size);
00046     if(ret < 0)
00047         throw SocketException("Connect failed (sctp_connectx)");
00048     return ret;
00049 }

00051 int SCTPSocket::state() const
00052 {
00053     struct sctp_status status;
00054     socklen_t size = sizeof(status);
00055     if( getsockopt( m_socket, IPPROTO_SCTP, SCTP_STATUS, &status, &size) < 0)
00056         throw SocketException("SCTPSocket::state failed (getsockopt)");
00057     return status.sstat_state;
00058 }

00110 int SCTPSocket::send( const void* data, int length, unsigned stream, unsigned ttl /* = 0 */, unsigned context /* = 0 */,
00111                       unsigned ppid /* = 0 */, abortFlag abort /* = KEEPALIVE */, switchAddressFlag switchAddr /* = KEEP_PRIMARY */)
00112 {
00113     int ret = sctp_sendmsg( m_socket, data, length, NULL, 0, ppid, abort + switchAddr, stream, ttl, context);
00114     if( ret < 0)
00115         throw SocketException("SCTPSocket::send failed (sctp_sendmsg)");
00116     else if (ret < length)
00117         throw SocketException("SCTP sent a fragemented packet!");
00118     return ret;
00119 }

00121 int SCTPSocket::sendUnordered( const void* data, int length, unsigned stream, unsigned ttl /* = 0 */, unsigned context /* = 0 */,
00122                                unsigned ppid /* = 0 */, abortFlag abort /* = KEEPALIVE */,
00123                                switchAddressFlag switchAddr /* = KEEP_PRIMARY */)
00124 {

00126     if( ret < 0)
00127         throw SocketException("SCTPSocket::send failed (sctp_sendmsg)");

00130     return ret;

00133 int SCTPSocket::receive( void* data, int maxLen, unsigned& stream)
00134 {
00135     struct sctp_sndrcvinfo info;
00136     int ret;
00137     if( (ret = sctp_recvmsg( m_socket, data, maxLen, 0, 0, &info, 0)) <= 0)
00138         throw SocketException("SCTPSocket::receive failed (sctp_recvmsg)");
00139     stream = info.sinfo_stream;
00140     return ret;
00141 }
00142 
00143 int SCTPSocket::receive( void* data, int maxLen, unsigned& stream, receiveFlag& flag)
00144 {
00145     struct sctp_sndrcvinfo info;
00146     int ret;
00147     if( (ret = sctp_recvmsg( m_socket, data, maxLen, 0, 0, &info, 0)) <= 0)
00148         throw SocketException("SCTPSocket::receive failed (sctp_recvmsg)");
00149     stream = info.sinfo_stream;
00150     flag = static_cast<receiveFlag>(info.sinfo_flags);
00151     return ret;
00152 }

00154 int SCTPSocket::timedReceive( void* data, int maxLen, unsigned& stream, unsigned timeout)
00155 {
00156     struct pollfd poll;
00157     poll.fd = m_socket;
00158     poll.events = POLLIN | POLLPRI | POLLRDHUP;
00159 
00160     int ret = TEMP_FAILURE_RETRY (::poll( &poll, 1, timeout));
00161 
00162     if( ret == 0) return 0;
00163     if( ret < 0) throw SocketException("SCTPSocket::timedReceive failed (poll)");
00164 
00165     if( poll.revents & POLLRDHUP)
00166         m_peerDisconnected = true;
00167 
00168     if( poll.revents & POLLIN || poll.revents & POLLPRI)
00169         return receive( data, maxLen, stream);
00170 
00171     return 0;
00172 }
00173 
00174 int SCTPSocket::timedReceive( void* data, int maxLen, unsigned& stream, receiveFlag& flag, unsigned timeout)
00175 {
00176     struct pollfd poll;
00177     poll.fd = m_socket;
00178     poll.events = POLLIN | POLLPRI | POLLRDHUP;
00179 
00180     int ret = TEMP_FAILURE_RETRY (::poll( &poll, 1, timeout));
00181 
00182     if( ret == 0) return 0;
00183     if( ret < 0) throw SocketException("SCTPSocket::timedReceive failed (poll)");
00184 
00185     if( poll.revents & POLLRDHUP)
00186         m_peerDisconnected = true;
00187 
00188     if( poll.revents & POLLIN || poll.revents & POLLPRI)
00189         return receive( data, maxLen, stream, flag);
00190 
00191     return 0;

00194 void SCTPSocket::listen( int backlog /* = 5 */)
00195 {
00196     int ret = ::listen( m_socket, backlog);
00197     if( ret < 0)
00198         throw SocketException("listen failed, most likely another socket is already listening on the same port");
00199 }

00201 SCTPSocket::Handle SCTPSocket::accept() const
00202 {
00203     int ret = ::accept( m_socket, 0, 0);
00204     if( ret <= 0)
00205         throw SocketException("SCTPSocket::accept failed (accept)");
00206     return Handle(ret);
00207 }
00208 
00209 SCTPSocket::Handle SCTPSocket::timedAccept( unsigned timeout) const
00210 {
00211     struct pollfd poll;
00212     poll.fd = m_socket;
00213     poll.events = POLLIN;
00214 
00215     int ret = TEMP_FAILURE_RETRY (::poll( &poll, 1, timeout));
00216 
00217     if( ret == 0) return Handle(0);
00218     if( ret < 0) throw SocketException("SCTPSocket::timedAccept failed (poll)");
00219 
00220     ret = ::accept( m_socket, 0, 0);
00221     if( ret <= 0)
00222         throw SocketException("SCTPSocket::timedAccept failed (accept)");
00223     return Handle(ret);
00224 }

00226 void SCTPSocket::setInitValues( unsigned numOutStreams, unsigned maxInStreams, unsigned maxAttempts, unsigned maxInitTimeout)
00227 {
00228     struct sctp_initmsg init;
00229     init.sinit_num_ostreams = numOutStreams;
00230     init.sinit_max_instreams = maxInStreams;
00231     init.sinit_max_attempts = maxAttempts;
00232     init.sinit_max_init_timeo = maxInitTimeout;
00233 
00234     int ret = setsockopt( m_socket, IPPROTO_SCTP, SCTP_INITMSG, &init, sizeof(init));
00235     if( ret < 0)
00236         throw SocketException("SCTPSocket construction failed (setsockopt)");
00237 }
